QuestData.Title: Warchief's Command: Krasarang Wilds!
QuestData.Description:
All able-bodied members of the Horde are hereby ordered to report to Zhu's Watch in Krasarang Wilds.
There have been rumors that the pandaren living in Krasarang Wilds are not their usual self.
Speak with Ken-Ken at Zhu's Watch. Perhaps he has a better idea of what has happened to cause the pandaren to become lethargic.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Ken-Ken in Krasarang Wilds.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Ken-Ken in Krasarang Wilds.
